summary.name: summary
summary.value: bad html tags in Zend_Form_Element_Submit and Zend_Form_Element_Hidden

description.name: description

value.body: Basically, it looks like you want the label decorator to use a no-break space when no label is present. This is already fixed in current trunk and 1.6 release branch.

The submit button element has the following decorators by default: ViewHelper and DtDdWrapper. If you want to remove the <dt> and <dd> elements, simply call removeDecorator('DtDdWrapper').

When in doubt, go to the source code and the manual -- this information is clearly documented.
